title: Skin Preview
body: I saw a program called skin preview, and I was wondering if you can get banned for it. Would like an answer.

replies.body: Riot does not officially support any third party programs. The main reason is that we cannot be sure that there isn't any malicious software attached to something, for instance a skin preview. While a skin preview by itself might be harmless, there's no way for us to know if it's giving you some kind of edge in your matches. Be sure to check out the [**third party applications**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications) page if you have questions, and feel free to hit me back up as well!
So will I get banned for using it though?

I wouldn't suggest using it personally since neither of us can be 100% positive that there isn't any harmful software attached to that program. If you check out that page under the section "CUSTOM CHAMPION MODELS AND ARTWORK", you'll see that our stance is basically use-at-your-own-risk. Another good bit of that page I'd like to point out is....

> We reserve the right to take action against applications that allow the use of our assets for free (often referred to as skin hacks).
